title: Battlefield: Bad Co. 2
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) VIP Access is not included with Games on Demand purchase. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".   Battlefield: Bad Company™ 2 brings the award-winning Battlefield gameplay to the forefront of Xbox 360 console with best-in-class vehicular combat and unexpected "Battlefield moments." New vehicles like the ATV and a transport helicopter allow for all-new multiplayer tactics on the Battlefield. With the Frostbite-enabled Destruction 2.0 system, you can take down entire buildings and create your own fire points by blasting holes through cover. You can also compete in four-player teams in two squad-only game modes, fighting together to unlock exclusive awards and achievements. Battles are set across expansive maps, each with a different tactical focus. The game also sees the return of the B Company squad in a more mature single-player campaign.

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Assault Kit Short-cut Pack
childDownloads.description: Packing a heavy punch in both offensive and defensive scenarios the Assault Kit is one of the most versatile kits in Battlefield: Bad Company 2 multiplayer matches.   With the Assault Kit Short-Cut Pack get immediate access to all the Assault Kit specific unlocks.   - 6 weapons, including the AUG, F2000, M416 and the high powered AN-94 - 3 specialisations, including red dot scope and the 4 x rifle scope - 3 gadgets, including ammo re-supply box and shotgun weapon attachment There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Bad Company™ 2 Vietnam Theme
childDownloads.description: Bad Company™ 2 Vietnam Theme

childDownloads.title: Bad Company™ 2 VIP
childDownloads.description: Extend your Battlefield: Bad Company™ 2 experience - VIP Access gives you new maps and game content!  Don’t miss out on content making your gameplay experience richer, get access today and look out for additional VIP releases (highlighted with the VIP symbol in the Battlefield: Bad Company™ 2 in-game store). IMPORTANT! Before buying this item, please check if you have a valid VIP code included on an insert with your copy of the game. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Battle for Hastings Trailer
childDownloads.description: Join the Battle for Hastings and perform team actions to unlock a fifth multiplayer map in Battlefield: Bad Company 2 Vietnam!  When all players on your platform have performed 69 million collective team actions, we unlock this new map.

Battlefield: Bad Company™ 2 brings the award-winning Battlefield gameplay to the forefront of Xbox 360 console with best-in-class vehicular combat and unexpected "Battlefield moments." With the Frostbite-enabled Destruction 2.0 system, you can take down entire buildings and create your own fire points by blasting holes through cover. You can also compete in four-player teams in two squad-only game modes, fighting together to unlock exclusive awards and achievements. childDownloads.title: Battlefield: Bad Company™ 2 - Battlefield Moments EP 2
childDownloads.description: Delivering best-in class vehicle warfare and unprecedented levels of destruction Battlefield: Bad Company™2 will deliver an all-out war experience unlike any other. In the second episode of the ‘Battlefield Moments’ series see ‘Destruction 2.0’ in full effect as a sniper fights his way through the war-torn streets of Arica Harbor in order to secure a valuable objective for his team.

childDownloads.title: Battlefield: Bad Company™ 2 Campaign Reveal Trailer
childDownloads.description: What starts out as another routine recon mission for B-Company soon takes a deadlier direction when they discover evidence of a new Russian super-weapon that can swing the balance of the global super-powers. With U.S. and Russian forces mobilizing the Squad's mission escalates into a frantic race against time to help stave off a new World War. From frozen Alaskan wastes to the jungles of South America Battlefield: Bad Company™ 2 delivers best in class vehicle warfare, vast sandbox environments and unprecedented levels of destruction - an all-out war experience unlike any other! Relasing March 4th across Europe and March 5th in the UK and Ireland.

childDownloads.title: Battlefield: Bad Company™ 2 Launch Trailer
childDownloads.description: Battlefield: Bad Company 2 arrives on Xbox 360! Join us in a waltz of destruction!!

childDownloads.title: Battlefield Bad Company™ 2 Squad Story 1 Trailer
childDownloads.description: Hot from E3 2009 comes the latest trailer for Battlefield: Bad Company 2. In a frantic firefight, danger comes from every angle; secure the objectives with your squad by destroying anything in your path. Jump into a helicopter or commandeer a tank for the decisive victory!

childDownloads.title: Battlefield Bad Company™ 2 Squad Story 2 Trailer
childDownloads.description: In the latest trailer for Battlefield: Bad Company™2  follow a squad's journey through hostile terrain as they fight to capture the objective. With nowhere to hide and facing an array of enemy soldiers and vehicles only by working together as a team can they secure victory!

childDownloads.title: Battlefield: Bad Company™ 2 Theme
childDownloads.description: Launching on March 4th in Europe Battlefield: Bad Company™2  delivers best-in class vehicle warfare along with unprecendented levels of destruction resulting in an all-out war experience unlike any other. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Battlefield: Bad Company™ 2 TV Commercial
childDownloads.description: Battlefield: Bad Company™ 2 is here! Check out the TV commercial being broadcast in select countries and follow a squads journey through the warzone where danger comes from every angle!

childDownloads.title: Battlefield: Bad Company™ 2-Theme 2
childDownloads.description: Launching on March 4th in Europe Battlefield: Bad Company™2  delivers best-in class vehicle warfare along with unprecendented levels of destruction resulting in an all-out war experience unlike any other. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Battlefield Moments – Episode 1
childDownloads.description: Delivering best in class vehicle warfare and unprecedented levels of destruction, Battlefield: Bad Company™2 is the ultimate all-out modern warfare experience. Get a taste of the spectacular action in-store with the Battlefield Moments series.  In Episode 1 join a squad of US soldiers as they battle through the Atacama Desert map, only by working together can they secure the decisive victory

childDownloads.title: Battlefield Moments 3
childDownloads.description: Venture into the war torn docks of Panama Canal in the classic Battlefield conquest mode. Teamwork is key if you want to capture your objectives and punish your enemies. Fueled by tactical destruction, an amazing array of vehicles and a vast selection of weapons, Battlefield Bad Company 2 delivers the best all out war experience for the Xbox 360. Game releases March 2nd 2010 in North America and March 4th 2010 in Europe.

childDownloads.title: BFBC2 Vietnam
childDownloads.description: Get ready for a whole new war, as DICE's massively popular online shooter Battlefield: Bad CompanyTM 2 makes the journey back to the 60's and the infamous Vietnam war.  Battlefield: Bad Company 2 Vietnam is a content-heavy expansion for the game that has sold more than 5 million copies and has been called "a better game than Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2" by The New York Times.  At the heart of this expansion lie four distinct, brand-new multiplayer maps based on the Vietnam War. Each map brings a new gameplay experience and fresh visuals, with characteristics such as foxholes, tunnels and dense jungles from where the enemy can launch surprise attacks.  15 weapons and 6 vehicles from the Vietnam War era are available from the moment you go online.  Requires the latest multiplayer update.

childDownloads.title: Day 1 Map Pack trailer
childDownloads.description: Battlefield: Bad Company™ 2 is here! In the Day 1 Map Pack trailer get a preview of two brand new maps available to download at launch. With dense snow-covered forest restricting vehicle use Nelson Bay will put your infantry combat skills to the test via the ‘Rush’ game mode whilst Laguna Alta features the classic ‘Conquest’ mode in a challenging woodland environment where effective use of ATV and infantry-fighting-vehicles will be the key to military supremacy.

childDownloads.title: Demo Tutorial Trailer
childDownloads.description: For the uninitiated entering the Battlefield in the hostile Alaskan terrain of Port Valdez can be a daunting experience. In the Demo Tutorial Trailer, DICE Producer Gordon Van Dyke gives the lowdown on the ‘rush’ mode along with intel to help drive both you and your team to victory.

childDownloads.title: Engineer Kit Short-cut Pack
childDownloads.description: A specialist in destroying and repairing vehicles, the engineer is a valuable asset to have during Battlefield: Bad Company 2 multiplayer battles.  With the Engineer Kit Short-Cut Pack get immediate access to all the Engineer Kit specific unlocks.   - 7 weapons, including the SCAR-L carbine rifle, the M2 Carl Gustav RPG launcher and the UZI submachine gun - 3 specialisations, including the submachine gun red dot scope and the 4 x submachine gun scope - 2 gadgets, the repair tool and the anti-tank mine There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Kit Short-cut Bundle Pack
childDownloads.description: Unlock all kit-specific items across the Assault, Engineer, Medic and Recon multiplayer kits in Battlefield: Bad Company 2.   Bundle pack also includes the 7 available vehicle unlocks  - Vehicle Motion Sensor - Hardened Armor - Extra Damage - Quick Primary Weapon Reload - Smoke Launcher - High-Power Optics - Coaxial Machine Gun There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Launch Trailer
childDownloads.description: Get ready for a whole new war, as DICE's massively popular online shooter Battlefield: Bad CompanyTM2 makes the journey back to the 60's and the infamous Vietnam war.  This is our launch trailer for this content-heavy multiplayer expansion.  At the heart of this expansion lie five distinct, brand-new multiplayer maps based on the Vietnam war. Each map brings a new gameplay experience and fresh visuals, with characteristics such as foxholes, tunnels and dense jungles from where the enemy can launch surprise attacks.  Also, 15 classic Vietnam-era weapons and 6 vehicles are available from the moment you go online.

childDownloads.title: Leave a Message Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: “Leave a Message” leaves a lasting impression on everyone who sets eyes on it, as it prepares players for an Army Ranger experience that only Medal of Honor can deliver.  View trailers, screenshots, concept art and more that Medal of Honor has to offer through “Tier 1 Central” exclusively at www.MedalofHonor.com.

childDownloads.title: Medal of Honor Body Bomb Trailer
childDownloads.description: Operating directly under the National Command Authority, a relatively unknown entity of handpicked warriors are called on when the mission must not fail. They are the Tier 1 Operators.

childDownloads.title: Medic Kit Short-cut Pack
childDownloads.description: A crucial member of the team, the medic is capable of not only healing and reviving team-mates but also laying down high volumes of sustained fire against enemy infantry  With the Medic Kit Short-Cut Pack get immediate access to all the Medic Kit specific unlocks.   - 6 light machine guns including the MG36, MG3 and the high powered M60 - 5 specialisations, including the  light machine gun red dot scope and the 4 x light machine gun scope - 2 gadgets, the medic kit and the defibrillator There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Onslaught Mode
childDownloads.description: Expanding the Battlefield: Bad Company™2 online multiplayer experience, Onslaught Mode delivers the first online co-op Battlefield action to Xbox 360! Up to 4 players can team up and put their squad skills to the test across 4 enhanced multiplayer maps, fighting against enemy land, sea, and air forces such as the new Mark V SPECACT boat. Work together to secure and hold a series of capture points in the quickest time possible and compare your stats on the Onslaught Leaderboards against your friends and other players across the community. With 4 different levels of difficulty, including Hardcore, Onslaught is the ideal battle ground for Battlefield: Bad Company™2 players, whether new or seasoned veterans, to perfect their squad play skills!

childDownloads.title: Onslaught Mode Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Coming soon to Xbox LIVE, Onslaught Mode expands the Battlefield: Bad Company™2  multiplayer experience by delivering online co-op for the first time on Xbox 360. Check out the Announcement Trailer for a first-look at the action in-store!

childDownloads.title: Recon Kit Short-cut Pack
childDownloads.description: Deadly from long-range, the Recon soldier is the only multiplayer kit which can deliver vehicle-destroying high-explosive charges  With the Recon Kit Short-Cut Pack get immediate access to all the Recon Kit specific unlocks.  - 6 rifles including the SV98, GOL and the powerful, accurate M95 - 4 specialisations, including the 12X high-power scope and the auto-spotting scope - 2 gadgets, the motion sensor mine and the mortar strike There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: SPECACT Assault Upgrade
childDownloads.description: This unique uniform and a camouflaged M16A2 gives players a different visual look on the battlefield in multiplayer matches. The pack also includes 3 new awards and one Achievement. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

The pack also includes 3 new awards and one Achievement. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
